unnormalised: **Energy & Utilities: Solar Rooftop Subsidies Sparking Diwali Cheer!**
normalised: energy and utilities colon solar rooftop subsidies sparking diwali cheer exclamation

unnormalised: Good news, folks! Getting solar panels on your terrace just got easier, thanks to the revamped rooftop solar subsidy scheme from the Ministry of New and Renewable Energy. Think sunshine and savings – just in time for Diwali!
normalised: good news comma folks exclamation getting solar panels on your terrace just got easier comma thanks to the revamped rooftop solar subsidy scheme from the ministry of new and renewable energy period think sunshine and savings dash just in time for diwali exclamation

unnormalised: This time, the process is streamlined. Forget running around government offices; you can apply directly through approved vendors in your city – like in Chennai or even little old Patna.
normalised: this time comma the process is streamlined period forget running around government offices semicolon you can apply directly through approved vendors in your city dash like in chennai or even little old patna period

unnormalised: Sources say subsidies can cover up to 40% of the installation cost for systems up to 3 kW. That could mean serious savings, potentially thousands of rupees! Imagine using that extra cash for a delicious biryani feast this festival season!
normalised: sources say subsidies can cover up to forty percent of the installation cost for systems up to three kilowatt period that could mean serious savings comma potentially thousands of rupees exclamation imagine using that extra cash for a delicious biryani feast this festival season exclamation

unnormalised: The Indian Renewable Energy Development Agency (IREDA) is reportedly playing a key role in facilitating loans and simplifying paperwork. Plus, net metering policies are becoming more common, meaning you can sell excess power back to the grid. More money in your pocket!

unnormalised: Experts are saying this could be a game-changer for rooftop solar adoption across India. So, ditch those firecrackers and invest in sunshine instead. Happy Diwali!

unnormalised: Remember to check with your local discom (distribution company) for details and eligibility. Don't wait, get your house ready for Onam next year with free electricity!
